description: Steep gravel launch spot from old roadway. Park up on hill under trees. Short paddle thru small creek and ponds to Mellon lake. May be a small beaver dam under the bridge. Beautiful clear water lake lots of rocky outcroppings and small bays to explore. Very few cottages. Watch for ospreys on the dead pine trees along the cliff to the north when crossing the pond.
directions: On west side of highway #41 seven miles south of Kaladar.Well marked  just past Sheffield conservation area sign.continue down hill past Dark Sky viewing area to launch and parking area.
title: Mellon lake
